summary: Six new texture sets for the beautiful ZinhuaCat Outfit by anano plus boots and socks. All can be crafted under the Elven category.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410911769.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Important information!
[/b]
[i][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffe599]This is NOT a lore friendly mod, approach with caution! :)[/color][/font][/i]

This mod requires [b]HDT High Heels System[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][/b]!

This mod requires [b]JinhuaCat Outfit - UNP by anano[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26916/?]here[/url][/b]!

For the recipes to appear in the crafting interface you need to have the crafting manual in your inventory!

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[youtube]cURGJ0WQhLU[/youtube] [youtube]EdeyzYobTbo[/youtube]
Thanks Vatiwah!
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Info:
[/b]
Six new texture sets for the beautiful ZinhuaCat Outfit by anano plus boots and socks. All can be crafted under the Elven category.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Notes:
[/b]
This mod is based on the JinhuaCat Outfit by anano which is one of my absolute favorites. I'm working on this mod on and off for some time now. Since anano provided the Photoshop files for retextures I had the opportunity to play around with colors and textures and affected a bit by the summer heat the result turned out to be pretty hot as well. I know that probably this is not what you would have expected from me to create but it was fun making it and I hope you will enjoy the chance to make a lighter than usual play-through as well. :)

If you endorse this mod please head over to anano's page and give an endorsement there as well for his awesome work! :)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26916/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410906653.jpg[/img][/url]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Acquisition:[/b]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1411437499.jpg[/img]
[i][font=Times New Roman]
If for any reason you can't find the book, type help "jinhuacat crafting manual" and player.additem xxxxxxxx 1 in the console to get the recipe book manually.
Also if you want to avoid gathering the materials there are enough inside the bag of supplies to create each of the recipes once.

Tip: [color=#666666]In case you don't want to break into the shop, start investigating the mysterious murders in Windhelm.[/color]
[/font][/i]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410918075.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Optional Downloads:[/b]

- None at the moment.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Future Plans:[/b]

- None at the moment.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b][color=#C0504D]Required mods:[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26916/?]JinhuaCat Outfit - UNP by anano[/url]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Known issues:[/b]
Using HDT Version without HDT High Heels System will cause your game to crash.
Due to the many transparencies of the armors, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
If you are using HDT HighHeels System and you see weird numbers at the top left of your screen disable the debug info as shown below.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405232089.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Installation:
[/b]
a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file inside the Skyrim folder

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Un-installation:
[/b]
a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by deleting JinhuaCat Retextures.esp from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folder [b]JinhuaCat[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/ folders.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410912110.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Mods used in the screenshots and video:
[/b]
Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY - UNPB by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture by Xs2reality[/url]
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11173/?]numenume Hair by numenume[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
Environment: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57591/?]JK's Windhelm. by JKrojmal[/url]
Animations: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?]The TBBP Animations by Dragonfly, LeCid and Shaomarc[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23600/?]Player Headtracking by Maegfaer[/url]
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url] heavily modified :3

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Permissions
[/b]
I can't give any permission for this mod since it's based on the original JinhuaCat mod by anano. Only contact me if you have proof of permission from anano to use this mod.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401340399.png[/img]
[b]Credits:
[/b]
Armor meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26916/?]JinhuaCat Outfit - UNP by anano[/url]
Socks mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
Boots mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP by Beazalbob69[/url]

Bethesda that made all this possible.
